header.headertext: AMENDMENT TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 39A*: After Clause 8, insert the following new Clause—
(1) This section applies to infrastructure on or under land—
text.IndentOne: (a) in a National Park or under the control of a National Park Authority or the Broads Authority or their successors in title; or
(b) designated as an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty.
text.quote: (2) It shall be the responsibility of the person, undertaking or authority who installed infrastructure to which this section applies to make arrangements for its removal in the event that it becomes redundant.”
